response: "{ \"title\": \"Maximum Sum of Two Elements Easy\", \"description\": \"#### Problem Description\\nGiven an array of integers, write a function that returns the maximum sum of two elements.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef max_sum_of_two_elements(arr: list[int]) -> int:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `arr` (list[int]): A list of integers.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns the maximum sum of two elements in the input array.\\n\", \"code\": \"\\ndef max_sum_of_two_elements(arr: list[int]) -> int:\\n    return max(x + y for x, y in [(x, y) for x in arr for y in arr if x != y])\\n\", \"tests\": [\"assert max_sum_of_two_elements([1, 2, 3, 4, 5]) == 9\", \"assert max_sum_of_two_elements([-10, -20, -30, 0, 40]) == 70\", \"assert max_sum_of_two_elements([1, 1, 1, 1, 1]) == 2\", \"assert max_sum_of_two_elements([]) == None\"] }"
